param.name: destination
param.comment: can be a space or an object in a zone. Providing Sector and Cluster will attempt to find the nearest zone

do_if.value: event.param2? and event.param2 and (event.param2.isclass.zone or (event.param2.component? and event.param2.component.isclass.zone))
this.ship.primarypurpose == objectpurpose.build and this.ship.buildmodule.exists and this.ship.buildmodule.buildanchor.exists and this.ship.pilot.$whatido != 'move.buildership'
not ($destination? and $destination) and (not this.ship.zone.ismapzone or this.ship.zone.istemporaryzone)

do_if.chance: if ['move.patrol','move.plunder'].indexof.{$run_script_name} and not global.$WWX_mmcarrier_is_active then 100 else 0

do_if.value: $destination.exists and (($destination.isclass.zone and $destination != this.zone) or (not $destination.isclass.zone and $destination.zone.exists and $destination.zone != this.zone))

( ['BR.move.patrol', 'move.patrol'].indexof.{$run_script_name} and this.$params.$range? and (['cluster','sector'].indexof.{this.$params.$range} or (typeof this.$params.$range == datatype.component and this.$params.$range.isclass.[class.sector, class.cluster] )) ) or this.$updateRange?

set_value.name: this.$updateRange
set_value.exact: if this.$params.$range? and typeof this.$params.$range == datatype.component and this.$params.$range.isclass.[class.sector, class.cluster] then this.$params.$range else if this.$params.$range? and this.$params.$range == 'cluster' then this.ship.cluster else this.ship.sector

set_value.name: this.$params
set_value.exact: table[$route = $zones, $allowstations = (if this.$params.$allowstations? then this.$params.$allowstations else false), $resetConf = (player.age + 12h)]
